content:
Craft an item of type: andesite_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 50, "index": 25}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 14, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft andesite stairs, I need to place 3 andesite blocks in the shape of stairs in the crafting grid. There are 6 andesite blocks in the inventory at slot 20, so I will first move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: andesite_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 50, "index": 25}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 14, "index": 43}]
thought: The second andesite block needs to go in slot 4, which is directly below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: andesite_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 50, "index": 25}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 14, "index": 43}]
thought: The third andesite block needs to go in slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 5 with quantity 1

thought: The fourth andesite block needs to go in slot 7, which is directly below slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Ok

inventory=[{"type": "andesite_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 9}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 50, "index": 25}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 14, "index": 43}]
thought: The andesite stairs have been crafted and are in the craft slot (0). I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
